skill.name: gene-database
skill.description: Query NCBI Gene via E-utilities/Datasets API. Search by symbol/ID, retrieve gene info (RefSeqs, GO, locations, phenotypes), batch lookups, for gene annotation and functional analysis.
skill.summary: Query NCBI Gene via E-utilities/Datasets API. Search by symbol/ID, retrieve gene info (RefSeqs, GO, ...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: The code performs HTTP requests to documented NCBI APIs and processes results locally. No sensitive file access, environment harvesting, or execution of external payloads was found.

content.value_statement: Finding reliable gene metadata across species is time consuming. This skill queries NCBI Gene and returns structured summaries or detailed records.
actual_capabilities: Search genes by symbol and organism using ESearch
Fetch gene summaries or full records by Gene ID
Retrieve gene data by symbol and taxon via Datasets API
Batch lookup gene IDs or symbols with rate limiting
Output JSON or human readable summaries
limitations: Requires network access to NCBI endpoints
Does not cache results or store local databases
Limited to gene data available in NCBI Gene

use_cases.title: Annotate gene lists
use_cases.description: Batch map gene symbols to IDs, descriptions, and locations for downstream analysis.

use_cases.title: Explore gene metadata
use_cases.description: Fetch detailed gene records, transcripts, and synonyms for a specific gene.

use_cases.title: Learn gene search syntax
use_cases.description: Practice E-utilities queries with organism filters and GO terms.

prompt_templates.title: Find gene IDs
prompt_templates.prompt: Search NCBI Gene for BRCA1 in human and list the Gene IDs.

prompt_templates.title: Summarize genes
prompt_templates.prompt: Lookup gene IDs 672, 7157, and 5594 and summarize symbol, description, and chromosome.

prompt_templates.title: Fetch by symbol
prompt_templates.prompt: Get gene data for TP53 in Homo sapiens and return a concise summary.

prompt_templates.title: Advanced pathway search
prompt_templates.prompt: Search for human genes with GO:0006915 and return the top 20 summaries.

output_examples.input: Lookup TP53 in human and summarize key fields

best_practices: Specify organism when searching by symbol
Use Gene IDs for precise lookups
Include an API key for higher rate limits
anti_patterns: Running large batch queries without delays
Assuming gene symbols are unique across species

faq.question: Is it compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill provides scripts and prompts that work with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code.

faq.question: What are the query limits?
faq.answer: NCBI limits requests per second, higher with an API key. The scripts use rate limiting.

faq.question: Can I integrate this into my pipeline?
faq.answer: Yes, you can call the Python scripts or import their functions in your workflow.

faq.question: Does it access my local credentials?
faq.answer: No, it only reads input files you provide and sends requests to NCBI APIs.

faq.question: How do I troubleshoot empty results?
faq.answer: Check the gene symbol spelling, add an organism filter, and retry with a smaller query.

faq.question: How does it compare to manual NCBI searches?
faq.answer: It automates queries and returns structured outputs, which is faster for batch work.
